select distinct sp.* from sys_project p ,proj_role_relation pr ,sys_role r ,sys_role_user ru ,sys_user u
,sys_role_permission rp ,sys_permission sp where p.id=pr.proj_id and pr.role_id=r.id and r.id=ru.roleId and u.id=ru.userId
and rp.roleId=r.id and sp.id=rp.permissionId
and u.username=#{username} and p.id=#{projId}
select distinct sp.id from sys_permission sp where sp.parentId=#{id}
